grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 経営破綻【ケイエイハタン】business failure
経済破綻【ケイザイハタン】economic collapse, financial failure, bankruptcy
kun reading compounds: 綻びる【ほころびる】to come apart at the seams, to be ripped, to be torn, to begin to open, to begin to bloom, to smile broadly, to break into a smile
